author: wn.com
title: Donation Drive Underway for Tomorrow's 'Hope Fest' (City of Tucson, AZ)
text: ( Source : City of Tucson, AZ ) The Hope Network today is collecting donations of gently-used clothing, shoes, accessories, canned food, bottled water, diapers, stuffed animals, and personal care items. Today 's event, which runs until 7 p.m.
